application_title.description: The title of the application, displayed in the web store.

application_description.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store.

action_title.description: The title of the action, displayed when the extension icon is hovered over.

badge_text.description: The text of the badge, displayed on the extension icon. This badge shows when the extension is active.
